name: Mejicano Foods
tag_list: tortilla, chicken-quesadilla, burritos, tortilla-maker, wheat-tortilla, tortilla-chicken, wrap-tortilla, mexican-tortilla
overview:
Mejicano Foods: Independently owned Canadian wheat tortilla makers

In 1995, the new trends in Mexican food caught the attention of two adventurous entrepreneurs. Our company came into existence as Mexican food grew increasingly popular with North American consumers.

A tortilla maker with a passion for innovation

Since its beginnings, our tortilla maker company has placed innovation at the heart of its mission. We have been pioneers in producing tortillas with olive oil, multi-grain, and other unique flavours. We offer the most complete range of wheat flour tortillas.

Mejicano Foods tortillas are approved by the Jewish Community Council of Montreal

Our products are aimed at retailers and the food service industry at large, and are available in various sizes and flavours.
